QuestData.Title: The Fight Continues
QuestData.Description: The dwarves of Ironforge kindly took us in when the trogg invasion and radiation forced us to leave Gnomeregan for the first time. But even the kindness of friends can't quell the longing for home.$B$BI sent out a call for brave gnomes and other members of the Alliance to help us regain control of Gnomeregan and defeat the usurper Thermaplugg once and for all.$B$BWe weren't able to achieve everything Operation: Gnomeregan set out to do, but Thermaplugg is on the run and we're closer to home than ever.
QuestData.LogDescription: Watch the holo-table in front of High Tinker Mekkatorque to learn about Operation: Gnomeregan.
QuestData.RewardText: Even now, only the S.A.F.E. teams dare to venture far into the city to search for survivors. Meanwhile, Thermaplugg has sent one of his followers, Crushcog, to distract us and buy time for him to dig in.
